metadata.Title: CVE-2015-3240 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: The pluto IKE daemon in libreswan before 3.15 and Openswan before 2.6.45,when built with NSS, allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service(assertion failure and daemon restart) via a zero DH g^x value in a KEpayload in a IKE packet.

criterions.comment: openswan: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
